page.title: 12Wild flowers of the area
page.content: Many of the flowers have suffered from the improved farming methods. Many of the flowers now grow along the verges. We have made a list of the plants that can be seen along the roadside: Bluebells,Red Campion, Common Cow Parsley, Jack by the Hedge,Wild Carrot, Common Mallow, Vetches, Meadow Sweet and Rose Bay Willow Herb. In a walk along the disused railway line many of the plants were found along with Ox_Eye Daisies and Red Poppies. We also discovered Cowslips, an Orchid,Sorrel,Buttercups and Vetches. Many of our flowers still remain under threat of disappearing because of improved farming methods.
